registred-functions.value: function x(t,e){if(null==e)throw'roles must be defined for member :'.concat(t.member);if(0<=e.indexOf('uysuser')||0<=e.indexOf('pyuser')||0<=e.indexOf('ybuser')||0<=e.indexOf('architect')){if(null==t.member||null==t.period||null==t.template)throw'one of member,period,template is not defined';memberSearch={'status.code':{'#in':['000','001','002']},_id:t.member};var n=db.common.findOne(memberSearch);null!=n&&(periods=[],templates=[],zeroCountDetected=!1,db.dataBankOrganizationStatus.find({member:t.member,workflowStatus:{'#in':['000','002','003']}}).forEach(function(e){periods.push(e.period),templates.push(e.template),count=db.dataBankControl.count({member:t.member,period:e.period,template:e.template}),0==count&&(zeroCountDetected=!0)}),zeroCountDetected||(controlQuery={member:t.member,period:{$in:periods},template:{$in:templates},result:'HATA VAR','#where':function(){return'000'==this.resultType||'001'==this.resultType&&null==this.note||this.note.trim().length<5}},result=db.dataBankControl.findOne(controlQuery),null==result?db.dataBankOrganizationStatus.update({member:t.member,workflowStatus:{'#in':['000','002','003']}},{$set:{controlResult:'000',note:n.name+' '+(new Date).toLocaleDateString()+' '+(new Date).toLocaleTimeString()+' tarihinde tüm formları kontrol etdi'}},{multi:!0}):db.dataBankOrganizationStatus.update({member:t.member,workflowStatus:{'#in':['000','002','003']}},{$set:{controlResult:'001',note:n.name+' '+(new Date).toLocaleDateString()+' '+(new Date).toLocaleTimeString()+' tarihinde tüm formları kontrol etdi'}},{multi:!0})))}}
